item.title: New Commercial Director for John F Hunt Power
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
Jeff Gale joins John F Hunt Power as Commercial Director following a career of over 30 years in international financial markets in the City of London. Recently Jeff has worked as a consultant for various companies and large financial institution consortiums where his roles have involved launching, developing, and scaling up firms. He has considerable […]

The post New Commercial Director for John F Hunt Power appeared first on Power.

item.title: John F Hunt Power acquires World’s first Hydrogen-Flybrid Generator
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
Following its launch last week, the first 105kVA Tecnogen/PUNCH Hydrogen-Flywheel Generator has been purchased by John F Hunt Power. Sharing the common commitment to be market leaders, the 20-year relationship between BGG Tecnogen and John F Hunt was strengthened earlier this year when Hunt invested £12 million in the largest single purchase of Stage V […]

The post John F Hunt Power acquires World’s first Hydrogen-Flybrid Generator appeared first on Power.

item.title: John F Hunt Group acquire Morris Machinery
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
Following a long-standing business relationship, John F Hunt Group are delighted to confirm that it has purchased the Morris Site Machinery business and its assets from the Morris family for an undisclosed sum. As established customers of Denyo via Morris, the deal was sealed in June following a visit to Denyo Japan by the John […]

The post John F Hunt Group acquire Morris Machinery appeared first on Power.

item.title: John F Hunt Power invest £10m in Stage V Generators
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
In probably the largest single purchase of Stage V sets dedicated to the UK Market, John F Hunt have ordered 180 new units ranging from 20 to 500kVA from Bruno Generator Group. The Italian manufactured sets have integrated telemetry, automatic regeneration without loss of power, and have been designed to Hunt’s specification, safeguarding them from […]

The post John F Hunt Power invest £10m in Stage V Generators appeared first on Power.

item.title: HMRC Changes in Fuel Legislation for April 2022
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
Following HMRC’s announcement ceasing the use of rebated red diesel and red HVO fuel on 1st April this year, we are changing the way we operate our fuel supply. From the 1st of April, rebated red diesel and red HVO will no longer be available for use in power generation, only white diesel and white […]

The post HMRC Changes in Fuel Legislation for April 2022 appeared first on Power.

item.title: Power at The Showman’s Show 2021 – Video
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
Our John F Hunt Power team has once again been at The Showman’s Show, the UK’s original and most comprehensive exhibition of products, services and entertainment for the festival, outdoor and special event industry. In this special edition, our Managing Director, David Hunt, discusses Power’s place in the UK market and the investment in “Stage […]
